title: How to Remove Your Birthday from Facebook: A Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Open Facebook on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open Facebook on your phone or tablet. This is the blue icon with a white "f" inside. You'll find it on your home screen or in your app list.

steps.title: Tap the menu icon ☰.
steps.content: Tap the menu icon ☰ . This is the three horizontal lines at the top-right (Android) or bottom-right (iPhone/iPad) corner of the screen.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy . It's just about halfway down the menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is the first option in the Settings & Privacy submenu.

steps.title: Tap Profile details.
steps.content: Tap Profile details . This option is under the "Audience and Visibility" header.

steps.title: Tap Edit next to "Basic Info."
steps.content: Tap Edit next to "Basic Info." You'll find this about halfway down the menu. Now you'll see your birthdate and birth year.

steps.title: Tap the privacy menu next to your birth date.
steps.content: Tap the privacy menu next to your birth date. You'll need to adjust the privacy of your birth date (month and day) and birth year separately. The menu icon says the current privacy level, such as Public or Friends .

steps.title: Select Only me from the menu.
steps.content: Select Only me from the menu. This tells Facebook not to show your birthdate to anyone who looks at your profile. It will still be visible to you. If you're okay with people you're friends with knowing your birthday, you could select Friends here instead.

steps.title: Make your age/birth year private (optional).
steps.content: Make your age/birth year private (optional). If you'd also like to hide your year of birth (and your age) from your profile, tap the privacy menu next to your birth year and select Only me (or Friends , to make it friends-only) as well.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Tap this option at the top-right corner to save your changes. Your new preferences will take effect immediately.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser. Facebook will open to your News Feed page if you're logged in. If you aren't logged in, follow the on-screen instructions to sign in now.

steps.title: Click your name tab.
steps.content: Click your name tab. It's the first tab in the left sidebar. This takes you to your profile.

steps.title: Click the About tab.
steps.content: Click the About tab. It's near the top of your profile, but below your cover image.

steps.title: Click the Contact and Basic Info tab.
steps.content: Click the Contact and Basic Info tab. It's in the left panel.

steps.title: Click the privacy menu icon to your date of birth.
steps.content: Click the privacy menu icon to your date of birth. It's to the left of the pencil icon. If your birthday is public, this will be a globe icon. If it's friends-only or friends-of-friends, you'll see an icon with people on it. If it's private, you'll see a lock. Your birthdate is actually separated into two sections—the month and date of your birth, and your birth year. You must control the privacy level of each of these two details separately.

steps.title: Select Only me as the privacy level.
steps.content: Select Only me as the privacy level. This ensures that nobody can see your date of birth on Facebook. If you're okay with friends seeing your date of birth but not random strangers, you can choose Friends instead.

steps.title: Click Done to save your changes.
steps.content: Click Done to save your changes. Now, if you want, you can also make your birth year/age private.

steps.title: Make your age/birth year private (optional).
steps.content: Make your age/birth year private (optional). If you also want to hide your age from your profile, click the privacy menu next to your birth year, select Only me (or Friends , to make it friends-only), then click Done .
